name: raleqi
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wb(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c1, w0))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c1, w0)), wceq(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, c1)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s0, c1, w0)))

-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Equality inference for restricted universal quantifier. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 22-Jun-2011.)
